quote_first: No one at the desk asked Louis for identification or payment. An elderly woman showed him to a tiny, spotlessly clean room, and left without offering a word. The earliest direct flight from Prague to Vienna left at
quote_last: , and Most had decided that Louis should not spend the intervening hours waiting in an airport lounge.
title: The Nameless Ones
author: John Connolly

quote_first: Casey Kingsley wasn’t entirely surprised to see his new hire sitting outside his office when he arrived at
quote_last: that morning. Nor was he surprised to see the bottle Torrance was holding in his hands, first twisting the cap off, then putting it back on and turning it tight again—he’d had that special look from the start, the thousand-yard Kappy’s Discount Liquor Store stare.
title: Doctor Sleep
author: Stephen King

quote_first: It was in the winter when this happened, very near the shortest day, and a week of fog into the bargain, so the fact that it was still very dark when George woke in the morning was no guide to him as to the time. He reached up, and hauled down his watch. It was a
title: Three Men in a Boat
author: Jerome K Jerome

quote_last: . (And here time forked.) I’ll turn it on.” The screen In its blank broth evolved a lifelike blur, And music welled.
title: Pale Fire
